title: KotlinCompiler

metadata.description: Learn about KotlinCompiler with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Kotlin Compiler (Editor)
With our online Kotlin compiler, you can edit Kotlin code, and view the result in your browser.
Run »
Example
fun main() {
println("Hello World")
}
Hello World

Click on the "
Kotlin Compiler Explained
The window to the left is editable - edit the code and click on the "Run" button to view the result in the right window.
The icons are explained in the table below:
Icon
Description
Go to 
Menu button for more options
Change orientation (horizontally or vertically)
Change color theme (dark or light)
If you don't know Kotlin,  we suggest that you read our
Kotlin Tutorial
from scratch.

★
+1

practice_exercises.title: Practice Exercise
practice_exercises.description: Create an example that applies the concepts from this tutorial.

summary: This tutorial covers KotlinCompiler concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use KotlinCompiler effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of KotlinCompiler and how to apply it in your projects.
